name: Olenaak.GitHub.io
body:
Olena Kyrychenko
==================

Cell: (425) 274-6277

Home: (425) 440-0263

olena.kyrychenko@live.com

**Objective:  Data Specialist** position where my analytical skills, experience and ideas can be utilized.

**Personal profile:**

- 7 years of experience in software development/engineering and support of power energy systems;
- Strong analytical, assessment and interpretation skills;
- Organized, goal oriented;
- Enthusiastic learner, who quickly grasps concepts and technical skills.

**Technical skills:**

- Systems: Windows7/Vista/XP/2000
- Languages: C#, Visual Basic, VBA, Pascal, Delphi, T-SQL, HTML , XML, XSL, ASP, CSS
- Databases: MS SQL, Oracle, MS Access, ODBC and OLEDB
- Office Software: MS Office, MS Visio, Genesis 32, MatLab, CorelDraw, Crystal Report.

**　**

**Career History:**

**June 2004 – January 2011 (on maternity leave since January 2008)**

**Senior Power Engineer/Software Developer**

**Central Electrical Power System NPC "UKRENERGO", Kyiv, Ukraine**

**Web:** [**http://www.ukrenergo.energy.gov.ua/ukrenergo/control/en/**](http://www.ukrenergo.energy.gov.ua/ukrenergo/control/en/)

**Company Profile**** : Central Electrical Power System** provides operational and technological control of Integrated Power system of Ukraine (IPS) in Kyiv, Cherkassy, Zhitomir and Chernigov regions.

**Duties**** :**

- Software design and development of UI applications for creating reports (using C#, VBA, Crystal Reports, T-SQL);
- Preparation of reports (electric power transfer balances; calculation of losses in electric power transformers and lines);
- Research and implementation of methodology and procedures to apply principles of electrical theory to engineering projects.

**October 2001 – June 2004**

**Software Development Engineer**

**State Enterprise "UKRENERGONALADKAIZMERENIYE" (UkrENI), Kyiv, Ukraine**

**Web:** [**http://ukreni.com.ua/**](http://ukreni.com.ua/)

**Company Profile**** : ****"UkrENI"** is developing and introducing the automated systems of the accounting of the electric power and management of power supply and power consumption.

**Duties**** :**

- System design and engineering;
- Development and testing application software, database;
- System installation and support.

**　**

**Education:**

**Kyiv National University of Technology and Design, Kyiv, Ukraine** ( [http://www.en.knutd.com.ua/](http://www.en.knutd.com.ua/))

2000-2002

B.B.A. in Finance

1996-2001

B.Sc. in Computer Science

**Languages:**

English - fluent

Russian, Ukrainian - native

**References:**

Available upon request
